parameter.name: url
parameter.documentation: A canonical reference to a value set. The server must know the value set (e.g. it is defined explicitly in the server's value sets, or it is defined implicitly by some code system known to the server).

parameter.name: valueSet
parameter.documentation: The value set is provided directly as part of the request.

parameter.name: valueSetVersion
parameter.documentation: The identifier that is used to identify a specific version of the value set to be used when generating the expansion.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.documentation: A text filter that is applied to restrict the codes that are returned.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.documentation: Paging support - where to start if a subset is desired (default = 0).

parameter.name: count
parameter.documentation: Paging support - how many codes should be provided in a partial page view.

parameter.name: includeDesignations
parameter.documentation: Controls whether concept designations are to be included or excluded in value set expansions.

parameter.name: displayLanguage
parameter.documentation: Specifies the language to be used for description in the expansions.

parameter.name: activeOnly
parameter.documentation: Controls whether inactive concepts are included or excluded in value set expansions.
